channel.title: Compiler error
channel.description:
This is my client compiler's error: Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operation Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .
I wrote this for my client compiler: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
This is my source compiler's error: javac:file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue...
I wrote this for my source compiler @ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
My server is a 317 server The original name is Dimescape by banter
This is what I wrote for environmental variables classpath: Variable name:Classpath Variable value:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
This is what I wrote for environmental variables path: Variable name:PATH Variable value:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Skylarz Skylarz
item.description:
@Skylarz wrote:

Ags Rush:

Try Removing the Semi-Colon ( from " /bin;".

I tried but its still the same error
Are you talking about environmental variables?Cuz thats where I changed mine
Now its like this:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin%CLASSPATH%

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Skylarz Skylarz
item.description:
@Skylarz wrote:

This is my client compiler’s error:
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operation
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

I wrote this for my client compiler:
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

This is my source compiler’s error:
javac:file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue…

I wrote this for my source compiler
@ECHO OFF
title Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

My server is a 317 server
The original name is Dimescape by banter

This is what I wrote for environmental variables classpath:
Variable name:Classpath
Variable value:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

This is what I wrote for environmental variables path:
Variable name:PATH
Variable value:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;

Read full topic
